name: Raids Full Clear
description:
Get yourself a spot for your weekly FULL clear on all raids. I expect all DPS players to come prepared with both a power and condi DPS build.

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- **Tank + G3**
  - Tank on <:valeguardian:703930901997944833><:gorseval:703930783198347284><:keepconstruct:703930783223644200><:xera:703930902069117008><:mursaat:703930783680954459><:deimos:703930783257067551><:soullesshorror:703930782841962557><:dhuum:703930782590304346><:largos:703930782275731498><:qadim:703930782649024573><:adina:703930780610461806><:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940>.
  - Take `Green 3` <:dhuum:703930782590304346>.
- **Off-Tank + Push + Kite @ Dhuum + Anomalies + G2**
  - Perform `Seeker Control` <:valeguardian:703930901997944833>.
  - Push the `Construct Core` <:keepconstruct:703930783223644200>.
  - Push/CC `Rigom` <:samarog:703930783257329714>.
  - Push the `Tormented Dead` <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557>.
  - Kite <:dhuum:703930782590304346>.
  - Take `Green 2` <:dhuum:703930782590304346>.
  - Tank one of Largos <:largos:703930782275731498>.
  - Tank a wyvern <:qadim:703930782649024573>.
  - Handle `Anomalies` <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940>.
- **Kite @ Sab**
  - Kite the `Flak` <:sabetha:703930783320113192>

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> **Boon DPS Roles:**
- **Tank @ SH**
  - Tank <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557>.

<:quick_generic:1176639827890937986> <:alac_generic:1176639824292220958> **Boon Roles:**
- **Stability**
  - Negate the <:fear:715162058802593872> **Fear** <:slothasor:703930783206998087>.
  - Provide <:stability:844163847161774121> **Stability** for shockwave <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940>.
- **Immob**
  - Immobilise `Ghosts` <:gorseval:703930783198347284>.
  - Immobilise `Prides` <:deimos:703930783257067551>.
  - Aid with `Seeker Control` <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> and `Rigom` <:samarog:703930783257329714>.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- **Cannons**
  - Take cannon 1 (1-3) or cannon 2 (2-4) <:sabetha:703930783320113192>.
- **Handkiter**
  - Perform `Hand-Kiting` <:deimos:703930783257067551>.
- **Epidemic**
  - Help kill `Tormented Dead` on a <:necromancer:675414199052140555> **Necro** build <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557>.
- **G1**
  - Take `Green 1` <:dhuum:703930782590304346>.
- **Boonstrip**
  - Bring a class that can negate boons <:dhuum:703930782590304346>.
- **Lamp**
  - Take the `Lamp` solo <:qadim:703930782649024573>.
- **Kiter**
  - Kite <:qadim:703930782649024573>.
- **Pull**
  - Bring a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** build with `Focus` <:qadim:703930782649024573>.
- **Portal**
  - Bring a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** or <:thief:675414199475634211> **Thief** build with `Portal` <:qadim:703930782649024573>.
- **Pylon**
  - Kite the `Pylons` <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940>.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> <:dps:1176639819191951390> **Non-Healer Roles:**
- **Condi @ VG**
  - Come with a condi DPS specifically for <:valeguardian:703930901997944833> **Vale Guardian**'s `Red Guardian`.

<:contacts:1181934601040576512> **Roles Anyone Can Choose:**
- **Reflect**
  - Bring some kind of projectile reflect <:matthias:703930783311593563>.
- **Towers**
  - Handle the `Towers` <:escort:841311758147911742>.

Let me know if you have any questions!

comp.name: Off-Tank + Push + Kite @ Dhuum + Anomalies + G2

templateOverview: A template for a raid full clear. The description mentions doing CMs if time/mood permits.
